text: The 2016 Los Cabos Open (or Abierto Mexicano Los Cabos) was an ATP tennis tournament played on outdoor hard courts. It was the 1st edition of the Los Cabos Open, and part of the ATP World Tour 250 series of the 2016 ATP World Tour. It took place in Los Cabos, Mexico from August 8 through August 13, 2016. It took over from the Claro Open in Bogota, Colombia that had been held the previous 3 years. == Singles main draw entrants == === Seeds === {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 !
